title: Ticket #3160: Collector will do a timeout on a query without notifying the client
description:
If say you do a condor_status from a machine who's clock is wrong, (behind by an hour), condor_status will tell you there is a communications error.

This is because the collector decides: "Received an expired query (old by 3075s), ignoring"

Since this basically expiring a lease, the collector should at least send a I'm terminating the lease message before closing the connection.

(this would let the client tool give a more clue-filled error and reduce debugging time)
